doc.title: Live Bondage, Volume Six
doc.plot: Originally produced for a live internet transmission, this video features six beautiful damsels in distress. In the first vignette, buxom brunette Kelsie Chambers plays a bound-and-gagged kidnapping victim who is held for ransom. In the second story, Nicolette Foster and Gina Caruso take turns as bondagee and bondager. In the final three sections, brunette bombshell Angela Valdez is energetically attempts to escape the cords that bind her to a chair, Gloria Reyes is left to struggle tied and muzzled on a bed and Jolene Desero is a naked bondage captive.
